creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Ciisa ki wo/ saimaki to iu/ kurumaebi/ Shibaura ni koso/ tsumite okuran

(When they are smaller/ prawns have a pattern on their shells/ that looks like the bands on a sheath./ It helped the fisherman of Shinaura beach/ band them together and catch then en masse.)

by Toshiyado no Tomiharu
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Untitled series of fish known as Large Fish
signed: Ichiryūsai Hiroshige ga 一立斎広重画
title: Horse Mackerel, Freshwater Prawns, and Seaweed
